text:
@10DowningStreet @EnvAgency @EmmaHowardBoyd Once again, as with Covid, you are shifting responsibility onto the individual.
It's your government that needs to act.
Stop building on flood plains.
Stop deforestation of uplands.
Stop pushing the water downstream.
Improve drainage schemes.
Individuals CAN'T do any of these.
